package.pujaDesc: 5 Brahmins/n Take Sankalp via Live Video Call/n Video Excerpts from the Pujan will be sent/n Vyas/n 1,25,000 Jaap/n Rudra Abhishek/n Dashansh/n Hawan/n Aarti/n Brahmin Bhojan on the final day/n All Samagri Included

1 Brahmin/n Take Sankalp via Live Video Call/n Video Excerpts from the Pujan will be sent /n Sharir Shuddhi /n Mukhya Sankalp, Prayschit Sankalp /n Ganesh Pujan, Punyavachan Matrika Pujan /n Naandi Sharaddh /n Bhumi Karma Anant Pujan /n Rahu Kaal Sarp Pratima Pujan (Rahu Chandi, Kaal Chandi, 1-Suwarna Sarp, and 8-Chandi Sarp)/n Navgrah Pujan, RudraKalash Pujan /n Aavahit Devta Havan, Kashetrapal Balidan/n Poorna Aahuti Pujan/n Samapti Sankalp, Shreya Dan, Aashirwad/n Please be fasting for the Puja/n All Samagri Included

1 Brahmin/n Take Sankalp via Live Video Call /n Video Excerpts from the Pujan will be sent/n Ganapati Pujan/n Punya Vachan /n Grah Shanti Havan and Nav Grah Pujan/n Matrika Pujan and Nandi Shraddha/n Nav Grah Pujan/n Rudra Kalash Pujan /n Havan, Balidan/n Poorna Aahuti, Aashirwad/n All Samagri Included

1 Brahmin/n Take Sankalp via Live Video Call/n Video Excerpts from the Pujan will be sent/n Day 1 - Ganga Poojan, Prayaschit Pujan, Kshour/n Day 1 - Narayan Bali, Mukhya Sankalp/n Day 1 - Brahma Vishnu, Mahesh, Yam, Pret, Pratima Pujan/n Day 1 - Hawan, Ekadash Vishnu Shraddh, Pach-Devta Shraddh, Balidaan /n Day 1 - Paalash Bali Dahan, Apyav Shraddha (9va and 10va Shraddha)/n Day 2 - 11ve se 1 Year Ka Shraddha (Pret Aaatma ka)/n Day 2 - Nag Bali /n Day 3 - Punyah Vachan/n Rates Applicable for one couple/n All Samagri Included
